thread.title: Listen to Passion Pit’s New Song “Somewhere Up There”
thread.title_full: Listen to Passion Pit’s New Song “Somewhere Up There”

author: Matthew Strauss
title: Listen to Passion Pit’s New Song “Somewhere Up There”
text:
Listen to Passion Pit’s New Song “Somewhere Up There” Michael Angelakos’ second new track in as many days Passion Pit Photo by Amanda Edwards/Getty Images 
Passion Pit have shared a new song, “Somewhere Up There.” It’s their second track in as many days, following “Inner Dialogue.” Both songs have the caption “#seaoflove,” and exist on the YouTube page for Michael Angelakos’ new Wishart Group . Listen to “Somewhere Up There” below. 
The Wishart Group is a new company that Angelakos is launching. It’s dedicated to supporting artists with legal, educational, and healthcare services. The New York-based company has raised $250 million in funding. Passion Pit’s last album, Kindred , came out in 2015. Angelakos released Merry Christmas, Mr. Fields under his own name last year. 
Watch Passion Pit’s “Constant Conversations” music video, via Pitchfork.tv: Artists In This Story
